title: Game crash after champion select.
body:
Everytime now my game disconnects/crashes/disappears after champion select. I then proceed to relaunch league and am stuck at a disconnect screen.
I've reinstalled League, restarted my PC done a bunch of things and it keeps happening. Is there a fix to this? Is there technical support from Riot?

replies.body: What do you mean by crash?  Are you receiving any errors, specifically?  Does the game load at all?  Let me know, and I'd be happy to help!

I am having this same issue, once champ select is over I go straight to the reconnect to game screen. Hit reconnect screen goes black for .5 secs and right back to the reconnect screen. I have tried running the repair tool, and uninstalling/reinstalling. Still happens. Also I am now in a low priority queue for leaving the game to often, thanks for punishing me for having your game fuck up on me.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=OMBA4Ena,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-27T18:29:39.509+0000)
>
> What do you mean by crash?  Are you receiving any errors, specifically?  Does the game load at all?  Let me know, and I'd be happy to help!

I can't really describe what happens, there usually is a brief period where the champion select screen ends to the loading screen. but the loading screen just doesnt pop up. I see a riot game bar in the bottom right of my taskbar thing (Where my internet, volume etc is) I Click on that, the client pops up in the screen as you've left a game with a "Reconnect" button. I spam that button and it doesn't do anything.

I've tried Reinstalling, the repair tool, the hexatech repair tool.

Edit: I have a puuush screenshot of the screen that pops up after I click the riot icon in the right
http://puu.sh/t2Nxz/0472c7bf4c.jpg

Is there a way we can communicate in live time on the client?

This information is great, thank you!  It sounds like you're network is going into a dormant state after champion select, and failing to transition over to the game servers.  I recommend going over the instructions in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this up.  I won't be able to offer a real time method of communicating, but you're welcome to submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to us instead if you like!

I'm having a similar issue with the new client, I tried the repair,checking the option to close client during game and updating my drivers,didn't help. The first game always takes forever to load and I have to wait about 8 minutes before I can manually close the client, using task manager does nothing. Another thing I noticed is a freeze when somebody drops a ward, but for now the only thing that helps the initial issue is to run a custom before I jump into a real game.
